page.title: 01RELIGION - ATTITUDES
page.content: Several people were interviewed and questioned as to the type of religious beliefs that they held,the results being{Church of England}, and {Methodism.On}being questioned as to whether they attended church regularly,on the whole the answer was "No".The only regular attender was the Vicar of one of the churches.One of the other people who attended only did so at Christenings,Weddings and Funerals.On the whole,people were uninterested or could not care less. There is an active Young Men's Christian Association thriving in the area which provides much entertainment and many activities for the youth in the area.Some people although non attenders support the church by making donations of money for the upkeep of the church and for building repairs. About 100 people attended services.
